page-home__landing-slide.title: Focused
page-home__landing-slide.description: I think design is like a "magic wand". If a service or product is the magic to solve a problem it is the role of design to act as an intermediary for the user to master it. I strive every day to create a "magic wand" that matches the user.

page-home__landing-slide.title: Passionate
page-home__landing-slide.description: I value my craft, have a deep passion for progression, and exist to solve challenges for brands i believe in. Since the beginning, my mission has been to do great work and to have a great time doing it. I believe my mission has guided me well.

page-home__landing-slide.title: Creative
page-home__landing-slide.description: I work to create innovative solutions that inspire, and foster memorable relationships between brands and their clients. With a focus on branding and UI/Web i strive to create usable and polished products through passionate and deliberate design.

page-home__sublanding.title: I design and code complex things beautifully in a simple way and i love what I do.

page-home__information.description: My name is Cristian Santacruz. I work as a User Interface, User Experience designer and Frontend Developer. Currently, I’m working like Frontend Developer at Ediscom with an amazing team to help designers, product managers and engineers collaborate better together. page-about__skills.title: Skills
page-about__skills.design-subtitle: I value simple content structure, clean design patterns, and thoughtful interactions.
page-about__skills.frontend-subtitle: I tend to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.

page-about__process.title: Development Process
page-about__process.content1: Before jumping into designing I always make sure that we’re asking the right questions and trying to accomplish the right challenges. This stage includes market research, competitive analyses, consulting and exploring possible solutions.
page-about__process.content2: At the end of this phase you’ll have a pixel perfect design for your app or website. During the transition from wireframes into the final design I create prototypes simulating final results before development.
page-about__process.content3: Since I’m a designer who can code too, I can easily work in close collaboration with developers up until the finish line and beyond. In case of web projects I also do frontend development.
page-about__process.content4: Complete overview of my design process through regular meetings. After the initial design versions I’m happy to do user testing with your customers to ensure the best possible solutions for their needs.
